knimeNode.name: PDB Connector Queries Table Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loops over a table containing an XML column of query definitions

fullDescription.intro:
This node loops over a table of XML query definitions in a column. The second output port contains the input table row corresponding to the query at the first output port, allowing results to be joined back to the incoming table in the loop body
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com
fullDescription.option: The name of the column in the new output table
How the node should behave if an inport does not contain a defined query
Should a row containing invalid XML be ignored? If not, execution will fail

ports.inPort: The incoming table, containg an XML column of query definitions
ports.outPort: The query definition for the current loop iteration
The table row containing the current query
